title: Interpretation of seeing a window in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a window in a dream for single people According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, a window is an opening in the house that overlooks a new area that may be completely different from the space inside the window. Every dead end goes to him, and that he has many opportunities that will appear to him in the future in various aspects of his life. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a window in a dream for single people according to his interpretation by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a window in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Imam Ibn Sirin says Sirin: Whoever dreams that he is looking out the window and the view he sees is not pleasing to himself and he feels disgusted by seeing it, then this dream shows the problems that the dreamer is going through. If one sees that he is looking out his window and overlooking the sea, this means that he will have a job opportunity in a far away place and will travel to it. If one looks out the window and sees the vast desert and sand, then this dream symbolizes the loneliness that the dreamer feels. One of the bad dreams is that Someone sees in a dream that he is looking out the window, and his window was looking at the graves, because this dream means the death of the dreamer. If the window faces the graves, this person will get sick. Some commentators say that a large window that brings sunlight into the house indicates the presence of a just and righteous woman in a man’s life. If the window is narrow and small, this is a warning to him that he knows a woman of bad character and he should stay away from her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing an exit through a narrow window in a dream: Exiting through a window in a dream shows his fear of confrontation and anxiety about the future. It also symbolizes his fear of confronting a specific person. If the window through which he exits is narrow, this means that he is trying to escape from the problems he faces in his life and does not want to enter into confrontations with other problematic parties. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a closed window in front of a single woman. One of the bad dreams for an unmarried girl is that she sees in her sleep that she is closing one of the windows. her house. This dream indicates that she will break up her engagement if she gets engaged, and if she is in a relationship, this dream indicates that she will break up with her lover. Because closing a window in a dream means ending a situation in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a window emerging in a dream: A married person, whether male or female, dreams that he is removing one of the windows of his house from unwanted dreams, as this indicates the presence of serious disagreements between the spouses and they are unable to resolve these matters. Problems and they end up. Divorce. We advise those who see this vision to try harder with their company to find solutions to these problems before they separate and lead to divorce. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a window being cleaned in a dream Cleaning windows in a dream is a welcome dream, but its interpretation varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. Whoever sees that he is cleaning a window In his home, the dreamer commits sins and disobedience. This dream is good news from God Almighty to repent to God Almighty, give up these sins, purify his life from its impurity, and push him to worship Him and insist on obedience. If the dreamer has a competition or problem in his life, then this dream means that it will solve

title: Secrets of interpreting seeing pigeons in a dream by Ibn Sirin for single women, pregnant women, married women, and different situations

preview.html: Seeing pigeons in a dream is one of the dreams that people rejoice in, and they always believe that it is a sign of goodness and the coming of relief and sustenance from God Almighty, because they are among the birds that God Almighty sent to stand in a cave. My heat is a moment in which the Messenger and his companion hid from the evil of the polytheists to mislead them from his place, and because the dream may differ in its interpretation from one person to another. The bathroom in a dream for single women, pregnant women, and married women, and different cases are detailed by Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin. Pigeons are pet birds that many people want to raise at home and see their beauty in colors and happy appearance when they fly high. Girls usually like to raise birds more, and pets are far from men to the extent that they may feel that this bird you are raising is small for her and she is afraid of anything about it. And it preserves its safety and its food so that it lives in good health. But what about the interpretation of a dream about pigeons? We will learn about it in detail in the next article from the encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream: In our real life, we often use doves as a sign of peace and love, and therefore they carry the same meaning in a dream. . This is according to the interpretation of the great scholar Ibn Sirin. A dove in a dream is considered evidence of the dreamer’s enjoyment of peace, freedom from restrictions, and complete freedom, God willing. Ibn Sirin also interprets seeing a dove as, in some cases, a sign of the presence of a loyal friend in the dreamer’s life. A dove to the dreamer in a dream is good news of the arrival of great goodness for him in reality, and perhaps it is a sign of the coming of relief from the Almighty. But if one loses the dove or stays away from it, this is a sign that goodness and joy will leave, God forbid. Although everyone is very optimistic When they hear the sound of doves in reality, however, the sound of doves in a dream does not bode well because it is a sign of the misfortune of death or hearing unpleasant news. Seeing a dove in a dream for a single woman is one of the most common dreams in which an unmarried girl’s chest is opened, especially if the dove is white. This dream foretells for an unmarried girl that her engagement is approaching and perhaps even her marriage if she is already engaged. Ibn Sirin indicated that seeing a pigeon in an unmarried woman’s dream is one of the good visions that heralds many good things, abundance of money, and success in life, and her skin may be good. Soon there will be good news about her marriage, I swear. He knows better. An unmarried woman bathing a little in her dream indicates that she will be engaged soon, and a large bath symbolizes her marriage to a young man she loves in the coming period. Also, eating a bath in general in a person’s dream symbolizes the abundance of goodness and the abundance of sustenance, so whoever sees a large bath in his dream Seeing it is a sign of his abundance of money, which may lead to extreme wealth, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman eats pigeons and finds that they taste good, then seeing them indicates that she will soon marry a wealthy young man, God willing. However, if the unmarried woman finds Pigeons have a bitter taste

title: Interpretation of a dream about twins by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Children are considered one of the greatest blessings that God created because they are a symbol of innocence, kindness, and love. Seeing twins is one of the visions that many see in a dream. Therefore, you are presented with a different website. In this article, Interpretation of a dream about twins by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about twins from Ibn Sirin. Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin said about the dream of twins that it is one of the dreams that reflects the life of the beholder, as it shows that the dreamer feels in his life a state of psychological comfort and reassurance, where every Problems and disturbances. They cause him discomfort and stress. If the twin boys in a dream are playing and having fun, this is a good sign for the fortuneteller’s circumstances to improve, and his life suits him. There are some details that change the interpretation of seeing twins in a dream, such as seeing them angry and not wanting to play.. What did they separate from each other? Some.Interpretation of dreams for twins, children only. Major commentators such as Imam Ibn Sirin and Imam Ibn Shaheen Al-Zahiri said that dreaming of twins for one girl is not a good vision, as the dream indicates that this girl is walking on a path that is contrary to the teachings of religion or tradition. . Therefore, she must review her relationships with those around her and correct her behavior. If a single girl sees a dream with twins, then this dream indicates her relationship with a person who is not suitable for her. He does not love her as she imagines, and he is not worthy of responsibility. If an unmarried girl sees twins with females, then this A blessed sign of her marriage to the person she loves and desires, and this person will make sure to achieve happiness for her. On the religious level, a dream of twin boys for a single woman indicates her closeness to her Lord and her desire to perform religious duties. Whereas if an unmarried woman sees a dream of twin boys who have three children This vision is blessed and indicates that she will acquire great wealth. Read also: What is the interpretation of a dream about giving birth to an unmarried woman in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about twin boys for a married woman. The interpretation of dreams about twin boys for a married woman is considered a hateful interpretation, as it indicates the worry and sadness that afflicts this woman. If a married woman has children and sees twins in her dream, this dream means that one of her children will be harmed. Some interpreters believe that a dream of twins for a married woman is one of the visions that express her suffering from poverty and the narrowness of her hand. If twins are in a married woman’s dream, this is a blessed vision that indicates On the coming of abundant goodness, along with the fulfillment of all her desires that she has long dreamed of. If a married woman sees that she has given birth to twins, this is a vision that shows that she will live a happy and fulfilling life with her husband, but it will not be devoid of vices because there are those who want vice. Imam Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi said about the interpretation of a dream about twins for a pregnant woman that she will be exposed to some health problems during pregnancy, and the pain of childbirth will increase, and her child who is saved may suffer. . Of illness for some time. Many modern interpreters believe that seeing twins in a pregnant woman’s dream is not necessarily a sign, because the

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bus sinking in the sea

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a bus sinking in the sea in a dream. Scientists give many meanings to what you see, so we present in the following lines the interpretation of a dream about a bus sinking in the sea in a dream and other details..Interpretation of a dream about a bus sinking in the sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a car sinking in the sea in a dream can be It is evidence of insistence on making a mistake, and God knows the unseen. When you see a car sinking and people do not escape from it, it may be a sign of staying away from sins and transgressions, God willing. If the dreamer sees the car sinking in a dream, this may indicate lost opportunities. And God knows the unseen. When you see a car sinking in a dream This can lead to freedom from hypocrisy, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about someone trying to strangle me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about someone trying to drown me in a dream. We do not have specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing yourself drowning in a dream could be a sign of negative feelings within you, and God knows best. The UnseenWhen you see yourself drowning in a dream, this may be a sign of a problem, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. However, if the dreamer sees himself drowning in the fullness of the sea in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness and living, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams of my beloved drowning in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of my beloved drowning In a dream, drowning can indicate problems and crises, and God knows the unseen. Seeing drowning in the sea can represent a failure to achieve goals, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a person escaping from drowning in a dream, it may be a sign of goodness and freedom from distress, and God knows the unseen. When An unmarried girl sees someone escaping from drowning in a dream, this may mean that she is getting rid of anxiety and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing.Interpretation of a dream about my son drowning in a well in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about my son drowning in a well in a dream Drowning a child may lead to unwanted problems, and God knows best.While If the dreamer sees saving a child in a dream, this may be a sign of material changes for the better, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of a person swallowing the sea in a dream. Drowning may be a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself drowning in a dream, this may mean bad things, and God knows best. Where if the dreamer sees himself drowning in A dream, as it can express a warning to the dreamer not to fall into sin, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my daughter drowning and saving her in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person calling the living by his name

preview.html: Did you feel confused or afraid by this dream? Of course, when a person has this vision, he may be afraid or confused about its interpretation and the messages that this dream carries, and we will present them in the following lines and from our website gptafser.com/, so follow the interpretation of seeing a dead person calling the living by his name in a dream for a single girl. When an unmarried girl hears her name from a deceased person in a dream This indicates that her future is good, God willing. The dream of calling a dead girl in a dream is a warning to her that she has committed wrong actions and needs to reconsider herself. See also: Calling the dead to the living in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the dead calling the living by his name in a dream for a married womanIf the woman sees In a married woman’s dream, the dead person calls her by name and she is happy about that. This indicates that you receive alms and pray for her. As for seeing the dead person shouting at her in an angry and loud voice in a dream, this is a dream warning her of one of her pursuers. And God knows best. Seeing her crying while talking to the deceased in a dream symbolizes that this woman needs support and suffers from loneliness. Crying in a dream, as for an unknown dead person whom she does not know, symbolizes the death of anxiety, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the living calling the dead by his name in A dream about a man and its meaning: When a man sees in a dream that a dead person is praying for him, this indicates that this man is praying for that dead person. And if he sees in a dream that the deceased gets angry and repeatedly calls the man’s name, this is a warning to him against actions that are not correct in his opinion, and accordingly To reconsider himself. And God knows best. The vision is considered the dead calling upon the living, but there was a rivalry between them before death. This dream does not deserve praise if we call him often to God Almighty. Read also: A dream about a dead person calling a living person The meaning of seeing the dead calling the living by his name in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation If she sees the dead person crying In a dream, while he is calling her, this is a sign that this woman does not pray for the dead woman, and God knows best. But if she sees in a dream that the deceased calls her repeatedly, this indicates that the birth process is approaching. And seeing the unknown dead woman calling for a pregnant woman in a dream is a sign of the difficulty of the birth process, She and her fetus may face difficulties, and God knows best. It may be that seeing the dead person smiling and calling her in a dream, and this indicates that her new baby will enjoy a safe situation, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the dead person calling the living by his name in a dream for young people and its meaningWhen a young man sees in a dream the dead calling from afar With a loud voice. Then the young man goes to death, and this dream is not praiseworthy, indicating the approaching term. And if he sees that the dead person appears to him and calls him and goes, but the young man does not go with him in this dream. Good news for him that he will overcome the difficulties he faces in his life. It is considered A vision of the dead person coming back to life and sitting with him, and the young man saw that the dead person was giving him this advice. He announces the livelihood he will receive and that God will relieve him of his worries, God willing. This dream is also considered for him news of positive changes that will affect his life and move him toward the better. You may be interested in: Interpretation A dream in which the person calling me...

And if he sees that the dead person appears to him and calls him and goes, but the young man does not go with him in this dream. Good news for him that he will overcome the difficulties he faces in his life. It is considered A vision of the dead person coming back to life and sitting with him, and the young man saw that the dead person was giving him this advice. He announces the livelihood he will receive and that God will relieve him of his worries, God willing. This dream is also considered for him news of positive changes that will affect his life and move him toward the better. You may be interested in: Interpretation A dream in which the person calling me...

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the veil in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a silencer: The veil is one of the types of veils imposed on women. It is the legal veil for every woman and must be observed. It is mentioned in the Holy Quran. The hijab covers a woman's body and her nakedness, and this is a reason to protect it from the view of others, but some women did not adhere to the hijab and were not convinced of it except during prayer. Since the veil is one of the important things in our lives, seeing it in a dream is the reason why many questions leave the desire to know the details regarding the interpretation, because the dream interpretation of the veil indicates different signs and symbols. Men and women. Interpretation of a dream about a hijab by Ibn Sirin: A silencer in a dream is a sign of goodness that will be pioneered. Washing a veil in a dream is a sign of fame. A veil in a dream can be a sign of a good reputation. An unclean veil when seen in a dream is a sign of bad reputation. Interpretation of a dream about a veil for a married woman: For a married woman to see in a dream that she is wearing a long veil, this indicates that her husband treats her well. Seeing a brightly colored veil is a sign of marital happiness and stability. Seeing a clean veil in a woman’s dream is a sign of pregnancy and it will be a male. Taking off the veil in a dream indicates the recovery of a poor husband. If a woman sees in a dream that she is wearing a black veil, this indicates her bad behavior. Seeing an old veil in a dream is evidence that there are enemies in her life who are plotting her plans. Interpretation of a dream about a veil for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees that she is removing a silencer in a dream, this indicates To the misfortunes you will face. If he sees that she is wearing a wedding veil, this indicates how much she thinks about this world and does not care about the afterlife. Seeing a woman wearing a white hijab. This is evidence of the amazing success and superiority she will enjoy in her life. Seeing a single girl in a dirty and torn muffler is a sign that she will face a lot of sorrows and problems. Seeing an unmarried girl with a torn and dirty muffler is evidence of an engagement. If she sees In a dream that she is wearing a veil and women love her, the number 1 is not a sign of marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about a veil for a man: If you see a black veil in a man’s dream, it means that he is good, disreputable, and a fool. To see a veil flying in a man’s dream, this indicates enemies. Interpretation of a dream about a veil for a pregnant woman: The veil in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the presence of a male child. When you dream of a pregnant woman wearing a hijab. This indicates the safety of the child and the mother, and also indicates an easy and accessible birth.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake bite on the legs of a married woman

preview.html: Therefore, we find that a neck sting is different from a sting to the hand, foot, or head, and that blood flow with the sting has a different interpretation, and we will learn this now through the following topic from our website mofser. com.Interpretation of seeing a snake biting his leg in a dream for a single girl. A snake bite on the right leg in a dream for an unmarried woman is interpreted as a failure in religious duties, and a preoccupation with worldly pleasures and ornaments. If a girl sees in her dream that a snake is biting her on her left leg, then there is an evil person who is bewitching her for his own goals. The infamous. The girl’s attack on the snake before it bites is evidence that the girl knows her enemies well and can deal with them wisely and defeat them. Interpretation of seeing a snake biting his leg in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream of a snake biting a married woman’s leg in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer is going through a major crisis. He will not be able to get out of this crisis on his own. If a married woman sees a snake biting her right leg in a dream, then if she has children, one of them will get sick or fail exams. Seeing a snake biting her toe in a dream is a spiteful woman from relatives who speak ill of the dreamer and harm With its reputation. A snake bite in a woman’s private area is a sign of surgery to get pregnant and she may suffer from other gynecological problems. See also: Interpretation of seeing a black snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a snake biting his leg in a dream for a man and its meaning. Seeing a black snake bite on his leg indicates that enemies They will defeat the dreamer and he will suffer heavy losses at the hands of the opponent, and God knows best. If someone dreams of a yellow snake biting him on the leg, this means that the fortuneteller will be exposed to a serious health problem, and God knows best. A snake bite in a dream is a danger threatening the dreamer, and a green snake bite is evidence that you are doing forbidden things and sins. And enjoy in this world. The meaning of seeing a snake biting her leg in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. A snake bite in a pregnant woman’s dream is not good and often indicates harm and serious illness for the dreamer and her fetus. Dreaming about a snake bite in the first months of pregnancy is a sign of miscarriage and it was also said that it is a sign of miscarriage. The dreamer to keep her child. Seeing a snake bite in the last months of pregnancy indicates the dangers and pain of childbirth, exposure to a wobbly birth, and the newborn may get sick. Read also: A snake bite on his hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a snake biting his leg in a dream for young people and its meaningWhen a young man sees in a dream as if the snake is coiling around Around his leg and bite him. This young man will be robbed under duress, and God knows best. If a young man dreams that a snake is biting him on the buttocks, this means that this young man’s secrets and private matters will be revealed and opened to everyone. A snake biting his left leg in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will be harmed in his workplace. He may be expelled, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a snake biting her leg in a divorced woman’s dream: If a divorced woman sees in her dream that a snake is biting her right leg. This means that anyone who supports her and spends on her will suffer serious damage to his jobs and money. It is also said that the snake bites the right leg of a divorced woman. The reference

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about garlic according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of a dream about garlic by Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream about garlic in a dream. The jurists agreed that it is very bad, and these hateful interpretations will be presented in detail in the following paragraphs. There are dreams in which the dreamer sees garlic with another symbol such as an onion or one of the types of fruit, and this is in case the vision changes. Of its meaning, and we will clarify that in the next article. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about garlic. When one sees garlic in a dream and the dreamer feels that its smell is pungent and fills the place strangely, the meaning here is dirty and indicates many painful news that follow in the dreamer’s life. It robs him of his stability and sense of happiness in his life. A person who is looking for comfort and peace in his life will see the symbol of garlic over and over again because he feels threatened and afraid, and the symbol of garlic is one of the symbols that confirms the dreamer’s need for security and peace. Al-Nabulsi explained that all interpretations of seeing garlic in a dream are very bad, except In one case, which is watching the patient eat a lot of it, because he will recover, God willing, from his illness. Al-Nabulsi continued his association with the symbol of garlic, and said that it indicates the hypocrisy of the dreamer, as he speaks sweet words to others in order to obtain from them benefits and interests of his own, as if he is eating garlic with onions. The dream will lead to the same meaning that we mentioned previously. When the dreamer eats cloves of garlic in a dream with his own free will and enjoys it, then he is gossip and slander for no reason, and he is happy with that because he is a person of weak faith, and is driven away by whispers. Satan.Interpretation of a dream about garlic by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that if the dreamer sees garlic in food while it is cooked, then his vision is good and does not have a bad meaning, because when garlic is cooked, its unpleasant odor decreases and its taste also differs from its taste. healthy. And it is not cooked. But if the dreamer sees that the palm of his hand is full of garlic cloves and he eats a lot of them, then the dream is interpreted as impurity from his money, and it is worth noting that the money that God has forbidden harms and ruins a person. His life. If the monarch takes garlic cloves by force and eats them under duress, then this is morally evil and insulting words that he hears from a person without conscience and mercy. If the opposite happens, and the dreamer feeds someone garlic against his will, and this person eats garlic while crying, then this indicates the ugliness of the dreamer’s behavior Which makes him hurt the feelings of others without thinking about the consequences of this on their psychology. . Case. The most prominent interpretations of a dream about garlic. Interpretation of a dream about garlic for a single woman. Garlic in a dream for an unmarried woman can express her marriage, if she only sees it without approaching it and eating it. One of the interpreters said that garlic in a virgin girl’s dream shows that she is logical and materialistic and is looking for a husband who will be wealthy to satisfy her. Her material desires are with him. When a virgin girl eats a lot of garlic in her vision, this is an unpleasant symbol in a dream and indicates a decline in her religious level and her interest in worldly temptations and pleasures. But if in a dream she smells the smell of garlic emanating from her clothes or body, this is a bad sign that her reputation She will be tarnished by her inappropriate behaviour

title: Interpretation of seeing a hug in a dream means hugging someone in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about embracing an old friend: If the dreamer sees that someone is embracing him in a dream, this indicates a strong longing for each other and the strength of the bond between them. As for the sleeper who sees that he is hugging someone, this vision while crying indicates separation and a desire to meet, and God knows best. Seeing a hug in a dream may indicate the ability to Winning his enemies who want to harm him. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing the dreamer hugging someone he loves, and that he will achieve the dreams he seeks. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s chest and an unmarried woman’s kiss: If he sees a free girl being hugged by someone in a dream, this indicates her closeness to that person, and God knows best. But if he hugs her This person strongly, it means that she will not feel comfortable with him and wants to separate from him. They symbolize seeing the hug of a lover. In the dream of an unmarried woman, she will hear good news in the coming period, God willing. To dream of an unmarried woman hugging someone she knows means that she will achieve great success in her professional life. Hugging from behind for single peopleIf the dreamer sees someone hugging him from behind, this indicates the strength of love, affection, and affection between the two people. See the point A married man hugging his wife from behind in a dream, for the stability of the family and a happy marital relationship. This vision can also indicate in a married woman’s dream that her husband is doing Everything in his power to make her smile. Seeing a person’s chest from behind in a single woman’s dream symbolizes that she will hear good news in the coming period, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about hugging my friendSee the point Hugging her friend Her friend in a dream will overcome all the problems she faces, God willing. If a girl sees that her boyfriend He embraces her in a dream, it means that she will achieve her hopes that she wants to achieve. See the point of hugging his girlfriend while crying. In the dream, this friend will leave the country soon and will not meet again. Seeing a friend’s chest in a dream shows the strong bond that binds the two friends to each other, and God is higher and knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a hug And kissing the beloved. If the dreamer sees this embracing his beloved in the dream, this indicates the sincerity of the feelings of both parties towards each other. This vision indicates that the dreamer will achieve great success and reap a lot of profits and gains from his existing projects. Seeing an unmarried young man embracing his beloved in a dream symbolizes that they will get married soon. God willing. But if the dreamer sees that his lover is hugging him and kissing him tightly, then this vision is not good, indicating farewell and separation, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about embracing a lover after separation and death. Seeing embracing the deceased in a dream indicates the dreamer’s strong longing for the dead and his desire to meet him, and God knows best. If The dreamer saw that he is embracing the deceased and kissing him, this indicates the dreamer’s lack of presence towards the deceased and his feeling of guilt towards him. Seeing him hugging the dead and crying in a dream symbolizes the dead person’s need for prayer, charity, and reciting the Qur’an for him. Then this vision indicates the fateful decisions that the dreamer will make during the coming period. . So he should think carefully about increasing the free girl if he is a hugger
